dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMonth DD, YYYY') invoice_date, (SELECT sref.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sref WHERE sref.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER') invoice_number, (SELECT sr.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sr WHERE sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BILL OF LADING NUMBER' AND sr.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND rownum = 1) bl_num, TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopdd JOIN s_ship_unit sunit ON sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid = sunit.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT sunit.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopdd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopdd.stop_num = 1), '999,999,999')) || ' X ' || TRIM(TO_CHAR( (SELECT ssu.received_ship_unit_count FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) ,'999,999')) || ' FT CONTAINERS' container_count FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON srn.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value LEFT OUTER JOIN VIEW_SHIPMENT_TOTALS st ON st.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID

SELECT DISTINCT oob.order_base_xid contract_number, loc.location_name party, (SELECT LISTAGG(la1.address_line, CHR(13)) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY la1.line_sequence) FROM location_address la1 WHERE la1.location_gid = loc.location_gid) address, TRIM(loc.city || ' ' || loc.province_code || ' ' || loc.postal_code || ' ' || loc.country_code3_gid) city_state_zip, obr1.remark_text credit_number, obr2.remark_text description, st.net_weight total_weight, (CASE WHEN NVL(obr3.remark_text,'XXYYZZYYXX') = 'XXYYZZYYXX' THEN '$/MT' ELSE '$' || REGEXP_REPLACE(TRIM(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obr3.remark_text, '[^0-9,.]+', '')), '999,999,990.00')), '\s*', '') || '/MT' END) unit_price, (CASE WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'MT' THEN '$' || REGEXP_REPLACE(TO_CHAR(ROUND(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) * 1.2,2), '999,999,990.00'), '\s*', '') || '/MT' WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'KG' THEN '$' || REGEXP_REPLACE(TO_CHAR(ROUND((TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) * 1000) * 1.2,2), '999,999,990.00'), '\s*', '') || '/MT' WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'ST' THEN '$' || REGEXP_REPLACE(TO_CHAR(ROUND((TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) / 0.907184) * 1.2,2), '999,999,990.00'), '\s*', '') || '/MT' WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'BU' THEN (CASE WHEN (SELECT itr.remark_text FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item it ON pi.item_gid = it.item_gid INNER JOIN item_remark itr ON it.item_gid = itr.item_gid AND itr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.STANDARD UNIT OF MEASURE' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) = 'BU' THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(TO_CHAR(ROUND((TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) / (SELECT TO_NUMBER(itr.remark_text) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item it ON pi.item_gid = it.item_gid INNER JOIN item_remark itr ON it.item_gid = itr.item_gid AND itr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.POUNDS PER STANDARD UNIT OF MEASURE' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) * 2204.5855379 * 1.2),2) , '999,999,990.00'), '\s*', '') || '/MT' ELSE 'ERROR - FREIGHT ADJ IN BU' END) ELSE '$' || REGEXP_REPLACE(TO_CHAR(ROUND(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) * 2204.5855379 * 1.2,2), '999,999,990.00'), '\s*', '') || '/MT' END) freight_charge, (CASE WHEN NVL(obr3.remark_text,'XXYYZZYYXX') = 'XXYYZZYYXX' OR NVL(obrn9.ob_refnum_value,'XXYYZZYYXX') = 'XXYYZZYYXX' THEN '$/MT' ELSE (CASE WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'MT' THEN '$' || REGEXP_REPLACE(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obr3.remark_text, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) - ROUND(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) * 1.2,2), '999,999,990.00'), '\s*', '') || '/MT' WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'KG' THEN '$' || REGEXP_REPLACE(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obr3.remark_text, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) - ROUND((TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) * 1000) * 1.2,2), '999,999,990.00'), '\s*', '') || '/MT' WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'ST' THEN '$' || REGEXP_REPLACE(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obr3.remark_text, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) - ROUND((TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) / 0.907184) * 1.2,2), '999,999,990.00'), '\s*', '') || '/MT' WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'BU' THEN (CASE WHEN (SELECT itr.remark_text FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item it ON pi.item_gid = it.item_gid INNER JOIN item_remark itr ON it.item_gid = itr.item_gid AND itr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.STANDARD UNIT OF MEASURE' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) = 'BU' THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obr3.remark_text, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) - ROUND((TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) / (SELECT TO_NUMBER(itr.remark_text) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item it ON pi.item_gid = it.item_gid INNER JOIN item_remark itr ON it.item_gid = itr.item_gid AND itr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.POUNDS PER STANDARD UNIT OF MEASURE' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) * 2204.5855379 * 1.2),2) , '999,999,990.00'), '\s*', '') || '/MT' ELSE 'ERROR - FREIGHT ADJ IN BU' END) ELSE '$' || REGEXP_REPLACE(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obr3.remark_text, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) - ROUND((TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) * 2204.5855379),2) * 1.2, '999,999,990.00'), '\s*', '') || '/MT' END) END) fob_value, (CASE WHEN NVL(obr3.remark_text,'XXYYZZYYXX') = 'XXYYZZYYXX' OR (NVL(obrn9.ob_refnum_value,'XXYYZZYYXX') = 'XXYYZZYYXX' OR NOT regexp_like(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '^-?[[:digit:],.]*$')) THEN ' USD' ELSE (REGEXP_REPLACE(TO_CHAR(st.mt_weight_numonly * TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obr3.remark_text, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) - st.mt_weight_numonly * (CASE WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'MT' THEN ROUND(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) * 1.2,2) WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'KG' THEN ROUND((TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) * 1000) * 1.2,2) WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'ST' THEN ROUND((TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) / 0.907184) * 1.2,2) WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'BU' THEN (CASE WHEN (SELECT itr.remark_text FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item it ON pi.item_gid = it.item_gid INNER JOIN item_remark itr ON it.item_gid = itr.item_gid AND itr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.STANDARD UNIT OF MEASURE' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) = 'BU' THEN ROUND((TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) / (SELECT TO_NUMBER(itr.remark_text) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item it ON pi.item_gid = it.item_gid INNER JOIN item_remark itr ON it.item_gid = itr.item_gid AND itr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.POUNDS PER STANDARD UNIT OF MEASURE' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) * 2204.5855379 * 1.2),2) ELSE 0 END) ELSE ROUND(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) * 2204.5855379 * 1.2,2) END), '999,999,990.00'), '\s*', '') || ' USD') END) fob_total, (CASE WHEN NVL(obrn9.ob_refnum_value,'XXYYZZYYXX') = 'XXYYZZYYXX' OR NOT regexp_like(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '^-?[[:digit:],.]*$') THEN ' USD' ELSE (REGEXP_REPLACE(TO_CHAR(st.mt_weight_numonly * (CASE WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'MT' THEN ROUND(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) * 1.2,2) WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'KG' THEN ROUND((TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) * 1000) * 1.2,2) WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'ST' THEN ROUND((TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) / 0.907184) * 1.2,2) WHEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value = 'BU' THEN (CASE WHEN (SELECT itr.remark_text FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item it ON pi.item_gid = it.item_gid INNER JOIN item_remark itr ON it.item_gid = itr.item_gid AND itr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.STANDARD UNIT OF MEASURE' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) = 'BU' THEN ROUND((TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) / (SELECT TO_NUMBER(itr.remark_text) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item it ON pi.item_gid = it.item_gid INNER JOIN item_remark itr ON it.item_gid = itr.item_gid AND itr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.POUNDS PER STANDARD UNIT OF MEASURE' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) * 2204.5855379 * 1.2),2) ELSE 0 END) ELSE ROUND(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(obrn9.ob_refnum_value, '[^0-9,.]+', '')) * 2204.5855379 * 1.2,2) END), '999,999,990.00'), '\s*', '') || ' USD') END) freight_total, (st.total_unadjusted_formatted || ' USD') sub_total_amount, (st.total_cost_formatted || ' USD') total_amount FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_involved_party obip ON oob.order_base_gid = obip.order_base_gid AND obip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc ON obip.involved_party_contact_gid = loc.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn9 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn9.order_base_gid AND obrn9.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.FREIGHT ADJ PRICE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn10 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn10.order_base_gid AND obrn10.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.FREIGHT ADJ UOM' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr1.order_base_gid AND obr1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_LETTER OF CREDIT NUM' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr2.order_base_gid AND obr2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_DESC GOODS SERVICES' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr3.order_base_gid AND obr3.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_PRICE' LEFT OUTER JOIN VIEW_SHIPMENT_TOTALS st ON st.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID
SELECT adjustment_num, adjustment_description, '$' || adjustment_amount_formatted || ' USD' adjustment_amount FROM VIEW_SHIP_UNIT_ADJUST_DETAIL WHERE shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID
